R

rainChance() - Method in class main.java.Farm
Returns a float value based on the farm's type to be used in a random object to determine whether the farm receives any rain.
rand - Static variable in class main.java.GameVariables
A static Random function for all classes to use.
reduceTidyness() - Method in class main.java.Farm
Reduces the tidiness of the farm by one and destroys crops if the farm becomes too messy.
refreshAnimalPane() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Refresh the components on the animals pane to display current information.
refreshCropPane() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Refresh the components on the crops pane to display current information.
refreshFeedAnimalsPane() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Refresh the components on the feed animals pane to display current information.
refreshInfoPanel() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Refresh the components on the info panel to display current information.
refreshInventoryPane() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Refresh the components on the inventory pane to display current information.
refreshPlantCropsPane() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Refresh the components on the plant crops pane to display current information.
refreshStorePane() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Refresh the components on the store pane to display current information.
refreshTendCropsPane() - Static method in class main.java.GameEnvironment
Refresh the components on the tend crops pane to display current information.
registerObjects() - Static method in class main.java.GameVariables
Registers all Crops, Animals, and Items by adding them to the HashMap registries and creates a new Store instance.
removeItem(Item.ItemType) - Method in class main.java.Inventory
Attempts to remove one of the item from the inventory.
resetTidiness() - Method in class main.java.Farm
Reset the farm's tidiness level to max.
